snippet.title: The Last Act - Visual Novel Trailer
snippet.description:
Here's the official trailer for Snowhaven Studios' visual novel The Last Act.

"Sarah’s an aspiring actress and finally got her big break! Productions come with their challenges and romances, but Sarah never thought her big break would bring a ghost! Will this supernatural hiccup ruin everything Sarah's worked for? Help her solve the mysteries, and she may also find love!"

Wishlist The Last Act on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1412180/The_Last_Act/
Trailer Created By: https://twitter.com/xHowardJones
Follow Snowhaven Studios on Twitter: https://twitter.com/SnowhavenStudio
Join the Snowhaven Studios Newsletter: https://www.snowhavenstudios.com/join...
See our other visual novels: https://snowhavenstudios.com/our-titles/
